Package in.tamchow.fractal.graphics.containers

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Pannable
    A data type that can be panned.
    Zoomable
    Interface that indicates that a system can be zoomed into losslessly
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Animation
    Stores frames for an animation, or here, transitions, with some metadata such as fps.
    LinearizedPixelContainer
    Holds an image as an SDA, extends PixelContainer
    PixelContainer
    Encapsulates an image or animation frame, for platform independence, takes int32 packed ARGB in hex values as pixels.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    PixelContainer.PostProcessMode
